brief_title: Study Evaluating DVS-233 SR In Adult Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder
brief_summary: To compare the antidepressant efficacy and safety of subjects receiving DVS-233 SR versus subjects receiving placebo.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Outpatients - Sexually active women participating in the study must use a medically acceptable form of contraception - Subjects must have a primary diagnosis of major depressive disorder Exclusion Criteria: - Treatment with DVS-233 SR at any time in the past - Treatment with venlafaxine (immediate release [IR] or extended release [ER]) within 90 days of study day 1 - Known hypersensitivity to venlafaxine (IR or ER)
